Class EnquiryService

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.service.impl.EnquiryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryService
public class EnquiryService extends Object implements IEnquiryService
Implementation of the enquiry service. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on the repository interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs an EnquiryService with the specified repository.
